org.helios.gmx
Class Gmx

java.lang.Object
  org.helios.gmx.Gmx
All Implemented Interfaces:
groovy.lang.GroovyObject, EventListener, MBeanServerConnection, NotificationListener
public class Gmx
extends Object
implements groovy.lang.GroovyObject, MBeanServerConnection, NotificationListener

Title: Gmx

Description: A factory for MBeanServerConnections and invocation facade.

Company: Helios Development Group LLC

Author:
Whitehead (nwhitehead AT heliosdev DOT org)

org.helios.gmx.Gmx

TODO: MBeanServer[Connection] by JMXServiceURL, JMXServiceURL String and protocol components. MBeanServer[Connection] interface impl. Property and invocation impl. (and remote) Remote MBeanServer Class Load Auto Reconnect Authentication for remote connections Composite type attributes and operation return values

public static Gmx newInstance()
Creates a new Gmx instance that wraps the local platform MBeanServer

Returns:
a new local platform MBeanServer wrapping Gmx.

newInstance

public static Gmx newInstance(String defaultDomain)
Creates a new Gmx instance that wraps a local MBeanServer

Parameters:
defaultDomain - The default domain name to get the MBeanServer for
Returns:
a new local MBeanServer wrapping Gmx.

attachInstance

public static Gmx attachInstance(String vmId)
Uses the VM Attach API to connect to a local VM and acquire an MBeanServerConnection.

Parameters:
vmId - The target virtual machine identifier, or, usually, the JVM's process id.
Returns:
a remote type Gmx to a local JVM outside this VM.

public static Gmx remote(JMXServiceURL serviceURL)
Creates a new remote Gmx

Parameters:
serviceURL - The JMXServiceURL to create the Gmx from
Returns:
a remote Gmx

public static Gmx remote(CharSequence serviceURL)
Creates a new remote Gmx

Parameters:
serviceURL - The JMXServiceURL to create the Gmx from
Returns:
a remote Gmx

attachInstances

public static Gmx[] attachInstances(boolean includeThis,
                                    groovy.lang.Closure<Gmx> gmxHandler)
Locates all JVMs on the local host using the attach API and invokes the passed closure on each. If a closure is provided, the Gmx will be closed after the closure is invoked and the return value will be null. Otherwise, the return value will be live Gmx instances. Attach failures are silently ignored.

Parameters:
includeThis - If true, includes this JVM (the one running this command)
gmxHandler - The optional closure to execute on each Gmx created for each discovered JVM.
Returns:
An array of Gmx instances created for each located and successfully attached JVM.

attachInstances

public static Gmx[] attachInstances(groovy.lang.Closure<Gmx> gmxHandler)
Locates all JVMs on the local host (not including this one) using the attach API and invokes the passed closure on each. Attach failures are silently ignored. If a closure is provided, the Gmx will be closed after the closure is invoked and the return value will be null. Otherwise, the return value will be live Gmx instances.

Parameters:
gmxHandler - The optional closure to execute on each Gmx created for each discovered JVM.
Returns:
An array of Gmx instances created for each located and successfully attached JVM.

attachInstances

public static Gmx[] attachInstances()
Locates all JVMs on the local host (not including this one) using the attach API and returns a Gmx for each. Attach failures are silently ignored.

Returns:
An array of Gmx instances created for each located and successfully attached JVM.

attachInstances

public static Gmx[] attachInstances(boolean includeThis)
Locates all JVMs on the local host using the attach API and returns a Gmx for each. Attach failures are silently ignored.

Parameters:
includeThis - If true, includes this JVM (the one running this command)
Returns:
An array of Gmx instances created for each located and successfully attached JVM.

isRemote

public boolean isRemote()
Determines if this Gmx is remote

Returns:
true if this Gmx is remote, false otherwise.

close

public void close()
Closes a remote connection. If this is not a remote Gmx, or the connection is already closed, the command does nothing.

isConnected

public boolean isConnected()
Indicates if this Gmx is connected.

Returns:
true if this Gmx is live, false if it is disconnected.

mbeans

public MetaMBean[] mbeans(ObjectName objectName,
                          groovy.lang.Closure<MetaMBean> beanHandler)
Queries the MBeanServer for MBeans with matching ObjectNames and executes the passed closure on each.

Parameters:
objectName - The ObjectName to match against
beanHandler - A closure which will operate on each returned MetaMBean
Returns:
An array of matching MetaMBeans.

mbean

public MetaMBean mbean(ObjectName objectName,
                       groovy.lang.Closure<MetaMBean> beanHandler)
Queries the MBeanServer for MBeans with matching ObjectNames and executes the passed closure on the first instance found.

Parameters:
objectName - The ObjectName to match against
beanHandler - A closure which will operate on the first returned MetaMBean
Returns:
The first matched MetaMBean or null if there was no match.

                               Object handback)

  • JMXConnectionNotifications: Delegated locally to Gmx

handleNotification in interface NotificationListener

getMBeanServer

public RuntimeMBeanServer getMBeanServer()
Returns the internal MBeanServer reference

Returns:
the internal MBeanServer reference which may be null if this is a remote connection and has not been server remoted.

getConnector

public JMXConnector getConnector()
The remote JMX connection

Returns:
the remote JMX connection which may be null if this is not a remote connection

getServiceURL

public JMXServiceURL getServiceURL()
The remote JMX connection JMX Service URL

Returns:
the remote JMX connection JMX Service URL which may be null if this is not a remote connection

getEnvironment

public Map<String,?> getEnvironment()
Returns the configured environment for this connection

Returns:
the configured environment for this connection which may be empty because no environment was set or because this is not a remote connection.

getConnectionId

public String getConnectionId()
Returns the remote connection Id

Returns:
the remote connection Id which may be null if this is not a remote connection

getServerDomain

public String getServerDomain()
Returns the MBeanServer default domain. This value is cached so this is a more efficient call than getDefaultDomain().

Returns:
the MBeanServer default domain.

getJvmName

public String getJvmName()
Returns the JVM Runtime name for the connected JVM If the connected MBeanServer does not have the RuntimeMXBean registered, this will be null.

Returns:
the JVM Runtime name for the connected JVM

toString

public String toString()
Constructs a String with key attributes in name = value format.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
a String representation of this object.
